import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // redux import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; const ProductCard = ({ product }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
Review

Rs. {product.productPrice}

{product.productName}

{product.productDesc.length > 60 ? product.productDesc.substring(0, 60) + "..." : product.productDesc.substring(0, 60)}

{/*

Add to cart

); }; export default ProductCard;
